column7: Examines the range of federal and state constitutional and statutory sources that apply to the constituents (pupils, parents, teachers, administrators, and board members) engaged in public schools. Emphasizes development of legal analytical skills. Same as EOL 547. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit.
column9: Same as EOL 547. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit.
column11: Priority will be given to department majors.
